collection.title: Collection / playlist download
collection.desc: Auto-detect and download mixes, seasons, and playlists.

batch.title: Batch download
batch.desc: Paste multiple links at once and download in one go.

platforms.title: Watermark-Free Download from Popular Platforms
platforms.description: Supports 100+ popular sites including TikTok, Bilibili, Kuaishou, Xiaohongshu, YouTube, Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, etc. Analyze and download HD files directly on mobile and PC.

douyin.name: TikTok/Douyin Downloader
douyin.desc: Supports domestic and international versions of TikTok/Douyin. One-click watermark removal, keeping HD audio and video.

bilibili.name: Bilibili Video Downloader
bilibili.desc: Supports anime, uploader submissions, and course videos. Preserves clarity and subtitles.

kuaishou.name: Kuaishou Watermark Remover
kuaishou.desc: Copy Kuaishou links to analyze. Batch downloading is more efficient.

xiaohongshu.name: Xiaohongshu Video Saver
xiaohongshu.desc: Removes in-app watermarks, keeping cover images and original HD sound.

instagram.name: Instagram Reels Downloader
instagram.desc: Supports Reels, posts, and story videos. Save directly to your local device.

youtube.name: YouTube Video Downloader
youtube.desc: Please watch the video tutorial: how to use Tampermonkey to download YouTube videos.

facebook.desc: Parses both public and private share links. Multiple resolutions available.
